{{stub}}
The '''Lord of the Rings Fanatics Plaza''' is a website that hosts forums dedicated to the discussion of [[Middle-earth]] and [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien's]] works. The original URL ''lotrplaza.com'' was taken down in the mid-2010s<ref>[https://www.reddit.com/r/tolkienfans/comments/f5iyec/lotr_plaza/ "LOTR Plaza"] a post by user u/PaladinBSwitch on r/tolkienfans (accessed 31 August 2023)</ref> and the site remained non-existent until it was revived during the [[wikipedia:COVID-19 Pandemic|COVID-19 pandemic]].<ref>[https://www.lotrfanaticsplaza.com/forum/app.php/what-is-this ''What is this?''] on lotrfanaticsplaza.com (accessed 31 August 2023)</ref>
